questions.question: Whom did Fihr (Quraish) favor in the conflict between Qusay (Jurhum) and Khuzah?
What building did Qusay build?
What activities took place in Dar Al Nadwa pre-Islam?
questions.answer: Events, announcements, war planning, weddings, girls starting to wear abaya
options: Events, announcements, war planning, weddings, girls starting to wear abaya

questions.question: Why did Dar Al Nadwa become famous post-Islam?
To whom did Qusay ibn Kilab give his entire estate?
What happened to Qusay's brothers?
questions.answer: They got their right from their nephews but after a huge fight was about to start between them
options: They got their right from their nephews but after a huge fight was about to start between them

questions.question: Among the sons of Qusay, to which son is the Prophet related?
Who among the Sahabas acquired Dar Al Nadwa?
What price did Hakim pay for Dar Al Nadwa?
What was Abd al-Muttalib's actual name?
How many children did Abd al-Muttalib have?
Was Abdullah the eldest son of Abd al-Muttalib?
options: No, he was not a son at all

questions.question: With which son was Abd al-Muttalib guided towards the rediscovery of the Zamzam well?
How many clues were given to Abd al-Muttalib in his dream regarding the location of the Zamzam well?
Did Abd al-Muttalib share the Zamzam well with other chiefs of Quraish?
questions.answer: No, instead went to Kahina, the fortune teller for advice
options: No, instead went to Kahina, the fortune teller for advice
He sold it to them for 100 camels
He ignored them and everyone forgave him

questions.question: Did Abd al-Muttalib fulfill his vow?
questions.answer: No, he threw arrows in the sky, played lottery of camels, and decided to sacrifice 100 camels
options: Yes, he completely fulfilled his vow as promised
No, he threw arrows in the sky, played lottery of camels, and decided to sacrifice 100 camels
He forgot about his vow and never fulfilled it

questions.question: Among the sons of Abd al-Muttalib, who accepted Islam?
Who among the sons of Abd al-Muttalib lived to see Islam but did not accept it?
questions.answer: Abd-Manaaf (Abu Talib) and Abdul Uzza (Abu Lahab)
options: Abd-Manaaf (Abu Talib) and Abdul Uzza (Abu Lahab)

questions.question: Who was most beloved to Abd al-Muttalib?
To whom did Abd al-Muttalib choose as Abdullah's bride?
questions.answer: Aminah bint Wahb who lived in Yathrib
options: Amama bint ysuuf who lived in Makka
Aminah bint Wahb who lived in Yathrib
Fatimah bint Asad who lived in Yathrib
Sawda bint Zam'a who lived in Taif
